description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Light-hearted competition that's great for friends or family, and a great party game. Watch the shadow of a moving object cast upon a curtain, and try to choose from 4 possible items quicker than opponents. Double-point and Lightning rounds spice things up so anyone could have the most points when the flipping is done! Play with up to 4 players or CPU opponents, in multiple unlockable game modes.
